Player History
Drafted in 19th round, 302nd overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Kevin Nelson (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2015, off Kevin Kunio (ATL)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Cincinnati on 7/22/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/17/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $4,888,000 per year...
Injured on 7/27/2017 with a Strained Back, out for 2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/17/2018 to a 3-year deal worth $650,000 per year...
Released by Seattle on 9/26/2018...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/15/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $800,000 per year...
Was claimed off waivers by Houston on 2/25/2020.
